data.title: PSN rules
data.text:
Read these Rules – they will help you have a better time playing online.

Talk to the adult who usually looks after you (we will call them your Responsible Adult) about using PSN and what you want to do.

PlayStation Network – or PSN – is our name for all the stuff you can do over the internet on your PlayStation console.

With an account for PSN you can create your own nickname and profile, add a picture, and connect with other friends who have an account for PSN.

If you are old enough to have an account, and your Responsible Adult gives you permission to sign up, your PSN account will let you:

Play games on the internet with people.

Chat and message with people.

Share your videos and pictures and see other peoples’ videos and pictures.

Buy and download or stream new games.

Buy and download some movies and tv shows.

Your Responsible Adult may choose to limit some of these activities so talk to them about what you can and cannot do with your PSN account.

There are a lot more rules for using PSN. You should ask your Responsible Adult to read them to you when you join and explain anything you don’t understand.

PlayStation Store is our shop for games, movies and many other things that you can buy and download. Just like with other things you do on PSN, there are some rules for using your PSN Account to buy things from us:

There are a lot more rules for using PSN but if you follow these 3 rules and never try to cheat, you will be OK. Ask your Responsible Adult to read the full PSN Terms with you when you join and explain anything you don’t understand.

The best way to contact us is via our website at: www.playstation.com/support. You may also reach us by phone at 800-345-7669.

You can also write to us at:

Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC

2207 Bridgepointe Parkway

San Mateo, CA 94404.

If you have a problem with your console or game, visit our Support site for helpful information or to learn how to contact a Support representative.

Ask your Responsible Adult for help if you need it.
